column1: Kata Robata////We got karaage blue crab from the daily specials menu
column2: and pan seared iberico pork with ginger soy sauce
column4: and chef's sashimi for 2 from the main menu. Our waiter also gave us grilled oyster mushrooms on the house. I loved everything
column5: especially the karaage blue crab and the sashimi. Sadly
column6: there was only crab left for the day
column7: as I was surprised by how tasty a small fried crab could be. The sashimi was incredibly fresh and flavorful. My favorite was the barracuda.
